message.body: Hey pretty :) what are your thoughts about tomorrow?
Anything you wanna do! 2 of the 3 parties I'm / we're invited to are in your old neighborhood in uptown!
Nice! Who/where is the other partie?
Ahhhh Mmk :) well let's see how we feel. My car is hopefully getting fixed but it may work out either way. Â My main prerogative is spending no $$$. And having you as my date. :) :) :)
I can definitely make that happen. Drink of choice for the nye??
Erm something yummy with champagne? Or nordeast...
Also, I'm free all day tmrw so we could gussy together or at least stare into each others eyes. :)
I'll let you know! I don't have real plans at all. So afternoon some time!
!!!!!! The cities twin! I can't wait to see all three of you. ;)
We did make it out ok! Marth and I had to join our respective families this morning. Thanks for the partie Travvie, it was surely a NYE to remember!!
Yay :) you left you deodorant and earphones at my place so you are just gonna have to come back up:)
